languages.text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

languages.text:
Космодесантник немедленно бросается к цели, игнорируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, и совершает одиночную атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g} увеличивается на +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g})</u>%.
Если между космодесантником и целью есть враги, космодесантник прорывается сквозь них, заставляя врагов пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(3 × бонус ВЫН)</u>. В случае провала противники оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, если это возможно.
languages.original_text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

languages.text:
Der Space Marine bewegt sich sofort neben das Ziel, ignoriert dabei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriffe{/g} und führt einen einzelnen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} mit +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischem Schaden{/g} aus.
Wenn sich zwischen dem Space Marine und dem Ziel Feinde befinden, stürmt der Space Marine durch sie hindurch und zwingt sie, eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −<u>(3 × ZÄH-Bonus)</u> zu bestehen oder für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} zu werden, falls möglich.
languages.original_text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar bewegt sich sofort zum Ziel, ignoriert dabei {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und führt einen einzelnen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} mit +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischem Schaden{/g} aus.

languages.text:
Le Space Marine se déplace immédiatement à côté de la cible en ignorant les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, et effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} unique qui bénéficie de +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}.
Si des ennemis se trouvent entre le Space Marine et sa cible, il les bouscule en chargeant, ce qui les force à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −<u>(3 × bonus d'END)</u>. En cas d'échec, l'ennemi subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, si possible.
languages.original_text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

traits.locale_text:
Le Space Marine se déplace immédiatement à côté de la cible en ignorant les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}, et effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} unique qui bénéficie de +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}.
Si des ennemis se trouvent entre le Space Marine et sa cible, il les bouscule en chargeant, ce qui les force à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −<u>(3 × bonus d'END)</u>. En cas d'échec, l'ennemi subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, si possible.

languages.text:
星际战士立刻移动到目标邻近位置进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，无视敌方{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%</u>。
如果星际战士与目标之间有其他敌人，则星际战士会穿过这些敌人。所有受影响的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-<u>（3×坚韧加值）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，对倒地效果免疫的敌人不受此效果影响。
languages.original_text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法立刻移动到目标处进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，无视敌方{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高<u>（10+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g})%。

languages.text:
El Marine Espacial se mueve inmediatamente hasta el objetivo, ignorando los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}, y lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}.
Si hay enemigos entre el Marine Espacial y su objetivo, el Marine Espacial carga a través, obligándolos a superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g}de −<u>(3 × bonificación por RED)</u> o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} si es posible.
languages.original_text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar se mueve inmediatamente hasta el objetivo, ignorando los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}, y lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} con +<u>(10 + 2 x {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}) % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}.

languages.text:
スペースマリーンは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視して、瞬時にターゲットの隣へ移動し、+<u>(10 + 2 x {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を1回行う。
スペースマリーンとターゲットの間に敵がいる場合、スペースマリーンはその敵を突破する。その敵に−<u>(3 × TGH ボーナス)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けたうえで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わせ、失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態にする。
languages.original_text:
The Space Marine immediately moves next to the target, ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}, and performs a single {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with +<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
If there are enemies between the Space Marine and the target, the Space Marine charges through them, forcing the enemies to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(3 × TGH bonus)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if possible.

スペースマリーンは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を無視して、瞬時にターゲットの隣へ移動し、+<u>(10 + 2 x {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を1回行う。
スペースマリーンとターゲットの間に敵がいる場合、スペースマリーンはその敵を突破する。その敵に−<u>(3 × TGH ボーナス)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けたうえで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わせ、失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態にする。

languages.text:
Uzay Piyadesi, bir anda koşup hedefin yanı başında biter, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} yok sayar ve +%<u>(10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}KUV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} veren tek bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
Uzay Piyadesi ile hedef arasında düşman varsa Uzay Piyadesi, bu düşmanları yarıp geçer ve −<u>(3 × DAY Bonusu)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmeye zorlar. Testi geçemeyen düşmanlar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilirler{/g} (tabii mümkünse). Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
